linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Operating System
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor
  • Graphics: 128MB 3D OpenGL 2.0 Compatible video card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (1.8GHz or better)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM

name: Battlevoid: Harbinger OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10/7/XP/Vista
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB 3D OpenGL 2.0 Compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The official soundtrack for Battlevoid: Harbinger. Excellent atmospheric music by Lombus.
